Lyric:
[by:chuyulun-]
[00:33.54]Well you only need the light
[00:35.89]when it's burning low
[00:38.08]Only miss the sun when it starts to snow
[00:41.86]Only know you love her when you let her go
[00:49.93]Only know you've been high when you're feeling low
[00:54.27]Only hate the road when you're missing home
[00:58.45]Only know you love her when you let her go
[01:06.62]And you let her go
[01:41.08]Staring at the bottom of your glass
[01:44.07]Hoping one day you'll make a dream last
[01:47.85]But dreams come slow and they go so fast
[01:57.56]You see her when you close your eyes
[02:00.55]Maybe one day you'll understand why
[02:04.58]Everything you touch surely dies
[02:13.30]Well you only need the light when it's burning low
[02:17.23]Only miss the sun when it starts to snow
[02:21.21]Only know you love her when you let her go
[02:29.13]Only know you've been high when you're feeling low
[02:33.62]Only hate the road when you're missing home
[02:37.75]Only know you love her when you let her go
[02:45.84]Well you only need the light
[02:47.63]when it's burning low
[02:50.18]Only miss the sun when it starts to snow
[02:54.21]Only know you love her when you let her go
[03:02.19]Only know you've been high when you're feeling low
[03:06.68]Only hate the road when you're missing home
[03:10.81]Only know you love her when you let her go
[03:19.28]And you let her go
